title: ISic000976. Funerary inscription for Oulpiane
body:
1Οὐλπια[νή]
2ἡ ἀξία μ[ου]
3ἔζησεν ἔ[τη ---]
4μῆνες ι´ [ἡμέ-]
5ρες η´

1ΟΥΛΠΙΑ[..]
2ΗΑΞΙΑΜ[..]
3ΕΖΗΣΕΝΕ[..---]
4ΜΗΝΕΣΙ[...]
5ΡΕΣΗ

Facsimile Images

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of Ferrua 1941;
  • Ferrua: ρες ι; but p.175 n.1 observes η or κ also possible; from the photograph η most likely; Kaibel: κ

English translation

James Hua

Oulpiane, my beloved, lived (-) years, 10 months, 8 days

commentary
